resources.name: New Mexico Coalition Against Domestic Violence
resources.description: Provides statewide advocacy, education, and support for survivors of domestic violence.

resources.name: Casa de Esperanza
resources.description: A safe shelter for survivors of domestic violence offering confidential services, advocacy, and counseling.

resources.name: La Familia Medical Center
resources.description: Provides healthcare services and support for survivors of domestic violence, including counseling and advocacy.

resources.name: Albuquerque Family Advocacy Center
resources.description: Offers a coordinated response to families in crisis, including services for victims of domestic violence.

resources.name: Safehouse
resources.description: Provides emergency shelter, advocacy, and legal services for survivors of domestic violence.

resources.name: New Mexico Legal Aid - Domestic Violence Program
resources.address: 500 Marquette Ave NW, Suite 600, Albuquerque, NM 87102
resources.description: Provides free legal assistance to victims of domestic violence for protective orders, custody issues, and more.

resources.name: La Casa, Inc.
resources.address: 204 W. Bowman Ave., Las Cruces, NM 88005
resources.description: A comprehensive service provider for domestic violence survivors offering emergency shelter, legal advocacy, and counseling.

resources.name: DONA Ana County Domestic Violence Task Force
resources.description: Provides support, advocacy, and resources for domestic violence victims in Dona Ana County.

resources.name: Crisis Center of Southern New Mexico
resources.address: 320 N. Main St, Las Cruces, NM 88001
resources.description: Provides emergency shelter, counseling, and legal services for victims of domestic violence and sexual assault.

resources.name: Northern New Mexico Family Justice Center
resources.description: Offers a coordinated response to victims of domestic violence, including legal aid, shelter, and counseling.

resources.name: Santa Clara Pueblo Domestic Violence Program
resources.description: Supports victims of domestic violence in the Santa Clara Pueblo with advocacy, shelter, and legal services.

resources.name: Youth Shelter & Family Services
resources.address: 1000 Old Pecos Trail, Santa Fe, NM 87505
resources.description: Provides shelter and services to youth and families affected by domestic violence and crisis situations.

resources.name: Santa Fe Rape Crisis and Trauma Recovery Center
resources.type: Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Support
resources.address: 1025 E. Alameda St, Santa Fe, NM 87501
resources.description: Provides support for survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault, including counseling and legal advocacy.

resources.name: Joy Junction
resources.type: Homeless Shelter and Domestic Violence Support
resources.description: Offers a safe shelter for individuals affected by domestic violence, as well as other resources like food and clothing.

resources.name: The Healing Center
resources.description: Provides confidential counseling and support groups for survivors of domestic violence.
